content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, while my name in this scenario is Peter Schmidt from Germany, let us focus on discussing the rental price for the apartment in München. Beginning with a high expectation, I propose the monthly rent of 1500 Euros. However, I am open to negotiation for finding a mutually agreeable price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial rental price proposal, Mr. Schmidt. However, considering my circumstances as a responsible and dependable student, I seek to lower the expenses as much as possible. With respect, I humbly request a reduction in the rental price. I don't want to continue the negotiation if we cannot find a more suitable figure for me.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your situation, Farhad, but as a landlord looking to maximize profits, my initial proposal of 1500 Euros per month remains firm. If you cannot accept this price, I don't want to continue the negotiation due to differing financial expectations. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
